org.jstockchart
类 JStockChartFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.jstockchart.JStockChartFactory

public abstract class JStockChartFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A set of utility methods for creating some charts with JStockChart.

作者：
Sha Jiang

方法详细信息

createTimeseriesChart

public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createTimeseriesChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                               TimeseriesDataset dataset,
                                                               org.jfree.chart.axis.SegmentedTimeline timeline,
                                                               TimeseriesArea timeseriesArea,
                                                               boolean legend)
Creates timeseries chart.

参数：
title - the chart title (null permitted).
dataset - timeseries data set(null not permitted).
timeline - a "segmented" timeline.
timeseriesArea - timeseries area.
legend - a flag indicating whether or not a legend should be created.
返回：
JFreeChart instance.
